EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.London Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next week at SpringOne Tour London!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We look forward to seeing you at SpringOne Tour London on Monday. Please review the event details here <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/london]]> and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Location: CodeNode 10 South Pl London EC2M 7EB
Getting There: Underground: The nearest London underground stations are Moorgate and Liverpool Street, both approximately a five-minute walk from CodeNode. Journeyplanner or Citymapper are great resources should you need further help planning your journey. Train:
The nearest national rail stations are Liverpool Street and King's Cross. Kings Cross is just a ten-minute underground journey away.
Car/Parking: The venue is located in Congestion Charge Zone meaning charges for nonresidents may apply. More info here <[[https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/congestion-charge/congestion-charge-zone]]>.
There are several NCP car parks nearby: ● NCP Finsbury Square, London, EC2A 1AD ● NCP Whitechapel High Street, London, E1 7RA
Bike: If you’re arriving or departing using a Santander Cycles Hire bike <[[https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/cycling/santander-cycles]]>, there’s a docking station on South Place.
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
